title: Biology
description: Explore the fascinating world of living organisms with our biology courses, covering key concepts in genetics, ecology, and human biology.

courses.title: Biology for Grade 9
courses.decription: Grade 9 Biology introduces students to the basics of life science, including cells, ecosystems, and the human body. Students engage in hands-on activities to explore biological processes...

courses.title: Biology for Grade 10
courses.decription: Grade 10 Biology deepens understanding of genetics, evolution, and plant and animal physiology. Students learn to analyze biological systems and their interactions with the environment....

courses.title: Biology for grade 11
courses.decription: Grade 11 Biology covers complex topics such as human anatomy, biochemistry, and ecology. Students develop critical thinking skills through detailed study and practical experiments...
